name: travel-app-capstone-project-udacity
description: Travel Application Project with Micro-services Architecture

scripts.start: concurrently "cd travel_app && npm run start-hosting-server" "cd service_registry && npm run start" "cd location_service && npm run start" "cd image_service && npm run start" "cd user_service && npm run start" "cd weather_service && npm run start"

author: Ricardo Bonilla Morales
